musicalLanguage.description: Magnetic Rag (1914) was Joplin's last published rag and shows his most mature compositional voice. It blends ragtime with deeper harmonic language, foreshadowing early jazz with unexpected chord changes and a bittersweet quality.
teachingGoals: Navigate chromatic harmony in ragtime context
Develop sensitivity to Joplin's late harmonic language
styleTips: Play with weight and gravitas — this is mature Joplin
Let the chromatic moments breathe; do not rush through them
